item.title: 俄罗斯 4 月份制造业采购经理指数（PMI）显示略有改善
item.description: 据 S&P Global 公司周一报道，俄罗斯制造业 4 月份的低迷态势略有缓解，产出和新订单的收缩速度略有放缓。【原文：The Russian manufacturing sector saw a slight easing in its downturn in April, with contractions in both output and new orders slowing to a marginal pace, S&P Global reported on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星组织任命让-弗朗索瓦-法拉赫为新任首席执行官
item.description: 法国卫星通信运营商欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat）任命让-弗朗索瓦-法拉赫（Jean-François Fallacher）为新任首席执行官，任期自6月1日起。【原文：French satellite telecommunications operator Eutelsat appointed Jean-François Fallacher as its new chief executive from June 1.】

item.title: 全球经济已感受到特朗普关税的拖累
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税正日益堵塞世界经济的车轮，而几十年来，可预测和相对自由的贸易为世界经济提供了润滑油。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs are increasingly clogging up the wheels of a world economy which for decades were greased by predictable and relatively free trade.】

item.title: 马来西亚总理认为美国可能降低关税，但经济增长将达不到目标
item.description: 马来西亚总理周一表示，由于华盛顿同意进一步谈判，马来西亚有可能通过谈判降低美国威胁征收的关税，但全球贸易战意味着今年的经济增长可能低于目标。【原文：There is a possibility that Malaysia can negotiate a reduction in threatened U.S. tariffs as Washington has agreed to further talks, but the global trade war meant economic growth was likely to be below target this year, the Prime Minister said on Monday.】

item.title: 欧洲 台币跃升；巴菲特下台
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: Anduril 将收购爱尔兰 Klas 公司，以加强人工智能战争系统
item.description: 人工智能驱动的国防初创公司 Anduril Industries 周一表示，它已就收购总部位于爱尔兰的战术通信系统制造商 Klas 达成最终协议。【原文：AI-powered defense startup Anduril Industries on Monday said it has entered into a definitive agreement to acquire Ireland-based tactical communications systems maker Klas.】

item.title: 越南总理称美国关税对全球经济造成负面影响
item.description: 越南总理范明正周一表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的 "对等 "关税正在对全球经济产生负面影响。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs are negatively affecting the global economy, Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh said on Monday.】

item.title: 油价下跌预示航油成本下降，澳航业绩飙升
item.description: 在欧佩克+计划进一步加快增产后，油价在亚洲早盘交易中下跌，澳大利亚澳航（Qantas Airways）股价周一上涨超过5%，创下一个多月来的新高。【原文：Shares of Australia's Qantas Airways rose more than 5% on Monday to an over one-month high after oil prices dropped in early Asian trade following OPEC+'s plan to further speed up output hikes.】

item.title: 特朗普 2.0 风险上升，澳大利亚市场欢迎工党领导下的政治稳定
item.description: 澳大利亚金融市场普遍欢迎中左翼工党的历史性胜利，因为这加强了政府应对特朗普的全球贸易战对经济造成的任何严重威胁的能力。【原文：Australian financial markets largely welcomed a historic win by the centre-left Labor Party as it strengthens the government's hand in dealing with any serious threat to the economy from Trump's global trade war.】

item.title: 科技网站 404 Media 称特朗普顾问使用的类似 Signal 的应用程序遭到黑客攻击
item.description: 科技网站 404 Media 周日称，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的前国家安全顾问迈克-瓦尔兹（Mike Waltz）使用的非官方版本 Signal 已被黑客入侵，这进一步引发了人们对美国政府最高层通信安全的担忧。【原文：The unofficial version of Signal used by Donald Trump's former National Security Adviser Mike Waltz has been hacked, tech site 404 Media said Sunday, raising further concern over the security of the communications exchanged at the highest levels of the U.S. government.】

item.title: 特朗普称希望与中国达成公平贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，美国正在与包括中国在内的许多国家就贸易协议举行会谈，他与中国的主要优先事项是确保达成公平的贸易协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said the U.S. was meeting with many countries, including China, on trade deals, and his main priority with China was to secure a fair trade deal.】

item.title: 就业提振美元有限，贸易问题挥之不去
item.description: 尽管对美国经济衰退的担忧略有缓解，但美元周一仍在苦苦支撑，投资者在等待中美贸易关系解冻的实际证据，而不仅仅是官员的暗示。【原文：The dollar was struggling to hold its ground on Monday even as concerns about a U.S. recession eased just a little, while investors awaited actual evidence of a thaw in Sino-U.S. trade relations, as opposed to just hints from officials.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布对美国境外制作的电影征收 100%的关税
item.description: 特朗普说，他授权美国贸易代表处理征收关税的相关事宜，因为其他国家为吸引电影制片人和制片厂提供了优惠政策，美国的电影业正在 "快速死亡"。【原文：Trump said he was authorizing the U.S. Trade Representative to process the institution of the tariff because the United States' movie industry is dying "a very fast death" due to other countries offering incentives to attract filmmaker's and studios.】

item.title: 欧佩克+将加速增产，石油价格下跌超过每桶 2 美元
item.description: 周一亚市早盘，油价每桶下跌超过 2 美元，原因是欧佩克+将进一步加快提高石油产量，从而引发了对更多供应的担忧。【原文：Oil prices fell more than $2 a barrel in early Asian trade on Monday as OPEC+ is set to further speed up oil output hikes, spurring concerns of more supply.】

item.title: 澳大利亚西太平洋银行上半年利润下降 1
item.description: 周一，澳大利亚西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）上半年净利润微降 1%，原因是技术投资导致运营成本上升，抵消了贷款总额的增长。【原文：Australia's Westpac Banking Corp recorded a marginal 1% drop in its first-half net profit on Monday, as a rise in operating costs due to technology investments offset growth in total loans.】

item.title: 日本称不打算在美国贸易谈判中威胁出售国债
item.description: 日本财政大臣周日表示，日本没有计划在与华盛顿的贸易谈判中威胁出售其持有的超过1万亿美元的美国国债，这澄清了早些时候有关持有债券可能被用作讨价还价筹码的言论。【原文：Japan has no plans to threaten to sell its $1 trillion-plus holdings of U.S. Treasuries in trade talks with Washington, its finance minister said on Sunday, clarifying earlier remarks that the bond holdings could be used as a bargaining chip.】

item.title: 马斯克表示，"星链 "已在刚果投入使用
item.description: SpaceX 首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周日在 X 上发帖称，该公司的卫星系统 Starlink 已在刚果投入使用。【原文：SpaceX CEO Elon Musk said on Sunday in an X post that the company's satellite system Starlink is now available in Congo.】

item.title: 特朗普表示，如果仍未达成协议，将延长嘀嗒截止日期
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，如果届时仍未达成协议，他将延长中国字节跳动公司（ByteDance）剥离TikTok美国资产的最后期限，TikTok是一款短视频应用，有1.7亿美国人在使用。 "我希望特朗普在周五录制并于周日播出的NBC新闻节目 "与克里斯汀-韦尔克尔会面"（Meet the Press with Kristen Welker）中说。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he would extend the June 19 deadline for China-based ByteDance to divest the U.S. assets of TikTok, the short video app used by 170 million Americans, if no deal had been reached by then. "I would ... I'd like to see it done," Trump told the NBC News program "Meet the Press with Kristen Welker" in an interview taped on Friday and airing on Sunday.】

item.title: 胡塞武装导弹落在机场附近后飞往以色列的航班再次停飞
item.description: 也门胡塞叛军周日发射的一枚导弹落在以色列主要国际机场本古里安国际机场附近，欧洲和美国的航空公司取消了未来几天的航班。【原文：European and U.S. carriers cancelled flights for the next several days after a missile fired by Yemen's Houthi rebels on Sunday landed near Israel's Ben Gurion International Airport, the country's main international airport.】

item.title: 特朗普称不会在任期结束前解除杰罗姆-鲍威尔的职务
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他不会在杰罗姆-鲍威尔的任期于2026年5月结束之前解除其联邦储备委员会主席的职务，同时将这位央行行长形容为 "十足的僵硬"，并再次呼吁美联储降低利率。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he will not remove Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve Board Chairman before his term ends in May 2026 while describing the central banker as "a total stiff" and repeating calls for the Fed to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 报道称中国蚂蚁金服集团计划将海外业务部门在香港上市
item.description: 中国媒体援引未具名消息人士的话报道称，中国电子商务巨头阿里巴巴集团的关联公司蚂蚁金服集团计划将其海外分支蚂蚁国际在香港证券交易所上市。【原文：Ant Group, an affiliate of China's e-commerce giant Alibaba Group plans to list its overseas arm, Ant International, on the Hong Kong stock exchange, Chinese media reported, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 伯克希尔投资者期待巴菲特交棒后的新时代
item.description: 悼念沃伦-巴菲特离任的股东们希望伯克希尔能保留其长期关注点和文化，但担心失去这位传奇投资者的远见卓识和明星效应。【原文：Shareholders mourning Warren Buffett's departure expect Berkshire to retain its long-term focus and culture, but worry about the loss of the legendary investor's vision and star power.】

item.title: 三位消息人士称欧佩克+将进一步加快石油增产步伐
item.description: 欧佩克+"组织的三位消息人士称，如果该组织成员国不能更好地遵守其产量配额，"欧佩克+"计划进一步加快石油增产，并可能在2025年10月前解除每天220万桶的自愿减产计划。【原文：OPEC+ plans to further accelerate oil output hikes and possibly unwind 2.2 million barrel per day of voluntary cuts through October 2025 if members of the group don't improve compliance with their production quotas, three OPEC+ sources said.】

item.title: 三星抗击 5.2 亿美元的印度税收要求，指出信实公司的做法
item.description: 文件显示，三星已要求印度法庭撤销对其网络设备进口进行错误分类的 5.2 亿美元的征税要求，并辩称印度官员知道这种做法，因为印度信实公司多年来一直以类似方式进口相同的元件。【原文：Samsung has asked an Indian tribunal to quash a $520 million tax demand for allegedly misclassifying imports of networking gear, arguing officials were aware of the practice as India's Reliance imported the same component in a similar manner for years, documents show.】

item.title: 沃伦-巴菲特的继任者格雷格-阿贝尔被视为伯克希尔文化的传承者
item.description: 格雷戈里-爱德华-阿贝尔于 1962 年 6 月 1 日出生于阿尔伯塔省埃德蒙顿的一个工人家庭。【原文：Gregory Edward Abel was born in Edmonton, Alberta, on June 1, 1962, to a working-class family.】

item.title: VIEW 对巴菲特计划卸任伯克希尔首席执行官、新任首席执行官阿贝尔的反应
item.description: 94 岁的沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）周六宣布，他将于 2025 年底卸任伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）首席执行官一职，并将权力移交给副董事长格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）。以下是各方反应：【原文：Warren Buffett, 94, announced Saturday he will step down as chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway at the end of 2025, and hand over the reins to Vice Chairman Greg Abel. Here are reactions:】

item.title: 巴菲特在关税压力下为贸易辩护，伯克希尔现金创纪录
item.description: 在宣布计划于今年年底卸任伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）首席执行官一职之前，沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）在周六为贸易进行了激烈辩护，称关税不应成为一种 "武器"，如果其他国家也能分享美国的繁荣，那么美国会过得更好。【原文：Before announcing his plan to step down as Berkshire Hathaway chief executive at the end of the year, Warren Buffett offered a fervent defense of trade on Saturday, saying tariffs should not be a "weapon" and the United States would be better off if other countries shared its prosperity.】

item.title: 伯克希尔股东否决多元化和人工智能提案
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）股东周六否决了一项要求该公司报告其子公司基于种族的举措所带来风险的决议，这是七项与多元化、人工智能和其他问题相关的提案中被否决的提案之一。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway shareholders on Saturday rejected a resolution requiring the company to report on risks from its subsidiaries' race-based initiatives, one of seven proposals tied to diversity, artificial intelligence and other issues that were voted down.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，壳牌正在研究收购英国石油公司的好处
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六援引知情人士的话报道，壳牌石油公司正在与顾问合作评估收购竞争对手英国石油公司（BP Plc）的可能性，不过该公司正在等待股价和油价进一步下跌后再决定是否出价收购。【原文：Shell Plc is working with advisers to evaluate a potential acquisition of rival BP Plc , though it is waiting for further stock and oil price declines before deciding whether to pursue a bid, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 巴菲特称格雷格-阿贝尔应在年底出任伯克希尔首席执行官
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffet）周六表示，副董事长格雷格-阿贝尔（Greg Abel）应在今年年底出任伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司的首席执行官。【原文：Warren Buffet said on Saturday that Vice Chairman Greg Abel should become Berkshire Hathaway's chief executive officer at the end of this year.】
